title: 2001 Art History FRQ Section 2 Part A Q1
stimulusHtml:
0 - Makes an attempt, but answer is without merit because it rewrites the question or makes only incorrect statements.

1 - Response correctly identifies the pharaoh. No other response of merit.

OR

An incorrect identification is given, but response correctly discusses 1 characteristic that is typical of the pharaohs reign.

2 - Pharaoh is correctly identified. The response correctly discusses at least 1 characteristic of the works that is typical of the pharaohs reign. Response may contain significant errors.

OR

Pharaoh is incorrectly identified. Correctly discusses at least 2 characteristics of the works that are typical of the pharaohs reign. Response may contain significant errors.

3 - Pharaoh is correctly identified. The response correctly discusses at least 2 characteristics of the works that are typical of the pharaohs reign. Discussion may not be as clearly or fully articulated as a 4. There may be some significant errors.

OR

Pharaoh is incorrectly identified. The response correctly discusses at least 3 characteristics of the works that are typical of the pharaohs reign. No significant errors in discussion (thus otherwise a 4 response).

4 - Pharaoh is correctly identified. The response fully and correctly discusses at least 3 characteristics of the works that are typical of the pharaohs reign. No significant errors.

Response correctly identifies the pharaoh. No other response of merit.

OR

Pharaoh is incorrectly identified. Correctly discusses at least 2 characteristics of the works that are typical of the pharaohs reign. Response may contain significant errors.

Pharaoh is correctly identified. The response correctly discusses at least 2 characteristics of the works that are typical of the pharaohs reign. Discussion may not be as clearly or fully articulated as a 4. There may be some significant errors.

OR

Pharaoh is incorrectly identified. The response correctly discusses at least 3 characteristics of the works that are typical of the pharaohs reign. No significant errors in discussion (thus otherwise a 4 response).
Pharaoh is correctly identified. The response fully and correctly discusses at least 3 characteristics of the works that are typical of the pharaohs reign. No significant errors.
